verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Only trust Him only trust Him Only trust Him now He will save you He will save you He will save you now{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come ev'ry soul by sin oppressed There's mercy with the Lord And He will surely give you rest By trusting in His Word{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For Jesus shed His precious blood Rich blessings to bestow Plunge now into the crimson flood That washes white as snow{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yes Jesus is the truth the way That leads you into rest Believe in Him without delay And you are fully blest{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come then and join this holy band And on to glory go To dwell in that celestial land Where joys immortal flow{/lang-eng}
